Description: Hi Team,
Whenever we enable DIP end user facing the upload issues . they are not able to upload the files.
What We've Learned Updated: asked the customer for details since they barely provided anything
Next Steps Updated: waiting on customer
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed

What We've Learned Updated: asked the customer for details since they barely provided anything

28.03
- customer is using Netskope which resulted in DPI not working (certificate not getting replaced)
- after disabling Netskope, EPP worked as intended
- we tried to white list EPP in Netskope, but we couldn't figure out how
- the customer to reach out to Netskope for help
